title: P2.3: Docs consistency + troubleshooting quality
description: Fix Python version mismatch (README says 3.10+, pyproject.toml says >=3.12). Remove/qualify unsupported claims (e.g. 'update annotations'). Add failure-mode matrix and diagnostic command docs.

contract.objective: No known capability mismatch between docs and implementation
acceptance_criteria: No unsupported capability claims in docs
